body.name: Molly’s Suds Natural Fabric Softener Liquid for Sensitive Skin | Plant-Based, Infused with Essential Oils | Fights Static, Reduces Wrinkles, Deodorizes | Peppermint, 50 Loads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 58 mins
features: SOFT, STATIC FREE CLOTHES: Unlike traditional fabric softeners that can deposit residues on clothes, Molly’s Suds plant- and vegetable-based Fabric Softener uses natural ingredients (no harmful quaternary ammonium compounds!) to leave clothes feeling fresh, cozy, and comfy. Ideal for sensitive skin, the planet, and all washing machines. Our clean formula reduces static and wrinkles more than detergent alone, so you and your family can look and feel your best.

INSPIRED BY NATURE: Made with only 7 earth- and plant-derived ingredients right here in the USA. Certified Cruelty-Free by Leaping Bunny. Free from artificial dyes, fragrances, parabens, waxes and other animal derivatives. Our fabric softener will leave your towels more absorbent, repel pet dander/hairs, and help prevent your sweaters from pilling.

MADE WITH REAL, FRESH SCENTS: Infused with essential oils made from real plant leaves, roots, and stems. Adds a light, fresh scent to clothes that rinses clean (and does not contain skin irritants like other artificial fragrances).

WHAT’S INCLUDED: One 34 oz bottle of liquid fabric softener with dosing cap. Softens clothes by removing residues and deodorizes fabrics for up to 50 loads. Hypoallergenic and gentle on sensitive skin.

HOW TO USE: Shake bottle with cap closed. Open bottle and measure to the correct load size (see diagram on package). For front load machines, pour into fabric softener dispenser. For top load machines, pour into center agitator. Run wash cycle and behold your velvety soft clothes.

Are Molly's Suds products safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Many of our customers have sensitive skin or eczema and that is why they use all of our products. There are no harsh or leaching chemicals and each product is clean rinsing. Are your detergents HE-friendly? Yes! All of our detergents are safe for standard, HE, and commercial washing machines. Our powder detergents do best when you add it directly to your drum and then toss in your laundry. Are your detergents septic-safe? Are they grey water safe? All of our laundry and cleaning products are septic-safe. Our Original Laundry Powder is grey water-safe, we even had it soil tested! Are Molly's Suds products safe to use while pregnant and/or for my baby's clothing? All of our products are safe to use during pregnancy. Our laundry products are all safe for use on baby clothing. Many parents choose our unscented laundry products for newborns, however our scented options are safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the results
reviews.reviewText: Fabrics are static free and smell fresh. No feeling of residual softener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good softener that keeps it's scent
reviews.reviewText: Bought the softener to go with the detergent. The softener does it's job and helps retain the light peppermint scent from the detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Like It!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and so far I like it! I decided to try more natural laundry materials after having an allergy test recently that led to me getting an epiPen and being given a long list of things I am mildly to severely allergic to.So far no reactions here, which is awesome! Before this I was using All Free + Clear which is the closest I’ve come to a laundry product that doesn’t make me itch. But I like that this option is not only better for me but better for the environment too.The smell is nice, not overpowering, although I’d argue it’s more of a flower smell and less citrus. It is very light (or thin), less thick than the Downy I’m used to pouring. My package was wrapped tight when it arrived so no spillage there.The only thing I’ve having issues with is this. The bottle suggests you shake it before pouring. When I do it’s like a bunch of softener gets trapped in the cap area and overflows the moment I open the lid. This happens even when I choose not to shake the bottle, so I’m wondering if it’s a design flaw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to compliment the wonderful laundry soap that doesn't leave all that much fragrance. I'm already using dryer balls which do a great job keeping static down, preventing wrinkles and making my clothes soft so I figured this might just do the truck to add more fragrance and soften everything a little more. Well, after more than half a bottle I can report that the clothes have no more fragrance than when using just detergent alone and the differences is exactly the same as if I didn't use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great non toxic product
reviews.reviewText: This makes your clothes soft and not staticky. The best part is, it is non toxic from a great trusted brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use Drops laundry pods and live where we have hard water. So my towels wouldn’t always smell clean after a wash. This fabric softener definitely added the boost I needed for my towels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best laundry detergent ever! love the no chemicals
reviews.reviewText: our house has switched to no harsh chemicals for washing our clothes and this is amazing. a little goes a long way! Lasts for 100 washes just as it states on the bottle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesnt help with Static
reviews.reviewText: Doesnt help with static at all. Unscented has an odd smell when smelling it out of the bottle but I dont notice it on the clothes.
